name: ISB Cancer Gateway in the Cloud
description: The ISB-CGC Data Overview section describes how the majority of data available through ISB-CGC originates from NCI projects and data contributions. Proteomics Data Commons (PDC) data is also integrated into ISB-CGC resources. Raw data is generally controlled-access, accessible through Google Cloud Storage buckets to authorized users. ISB-CGC provides processed data, generally open-access on the platform, in two ways: through Google Cloud Storage and Google BigQuery. There are specific data use guidelines and policies for data access.
data_use_limitations: Refer to the Genomic Data Commons (GDC) Data Use Guidelines and The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA) Data Use Policy Statement for detailed information.
